# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Use this section to tell people about which versions of your project are
currently being supported with security updates.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.1.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report security vulnerabilities to the maintainers via email or create a security advisory in GitHub.

We will acknowledge receipt of your vulnerability report and strive to send you regular updates about our progress.
